violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Limit the number of people to less than 1000.

violations.description: Persons with black badges are nearby.
violations.recommendation: Remove the persons from the scene.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant due to exceeding the Max Occupancy rule and having restricted zone access with black badges present. This poses a high risk of security breach as these persons may have malicious intent.
